turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hello.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I need to order some pizza.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, where would you like to order from?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, it looks like the closes pizzeria is bella luna, is that ok?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's fine. I need three large pizzas.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, what type of pizzas?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I need a veggie. I need one veggie pizza and one meat lover and and all mushroom.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, what you like any dipping sauces?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Now.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like to have a side of breadsticks if I could have some, if they serve it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, let me add that to your order.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: How much would that be?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, any other special requests?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, that's it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your total will be $72 dollars.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: How long will it take to be delivered?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: are you dining in tonight?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, it'll take 20 minutes to take.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: let me confirm your order for you.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Confirm it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: 1 large veggie, 1 large meat lovers, 1 all mushroom, and breadsticks for $72.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, correct.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you very much, have a great beautiful day. Okay, thank you very much.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, your order will be ready in 20 minutes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: enjoy your pizza.
